website_summaries.verdict: Stylish, well-crafted, and worth the extra cost. Great gift idea for Christmas or birthdays.
pros: Several window slots for ID presentation
cons: Slots may be tight, making extraction difficult

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice, Larger Tri-Fold Wallet. Durable and well made. Smells like Real Leather (good).
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice wallet. It is a little larger than I had anticipated but extremely durable and I like the ID holder in the middle. It's organized the way I like it to keep certain things grouped together (IDs, CCs, Medical Cards, etc.). Some people complaining about the smell must not have ever owned real leather before. I am pretty sensitive to smells and this does NOT have an odor other than a slight new-leather smell which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael MTop Contributor: Brewing

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of the same wallet over the last 6 years. While it was very well made and long lasting, it kept breaking my cards across the top. I would try to rotate them but then...yes...it would crack the bottoms! I picked this wallet for two reasons. The credit cards are kept vertical, so hopefully no cracking the edges off anymore. 2nd, it has a divider in the money holder so I can keep cash on one side and receipts on the other. It is made of a very soft leather and seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: Christian D. Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Long Haul
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet figuring the Perry Ellis name would assure some decent quality control. When I got it I was happy with the capacity and the number of slots for cards, etc. However, after about 6 months of normal use the dye started coming off the leather, leaving big white streaks. It looked like I had had it for 20 years or I had washed it in the dishwasher or something, and I'm pretty delicate with my belongings. So, if you want a wallet that will look decent for more than a few months I would suggest you keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley M. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This wallet has lasted 2 years before it started to fall apart. It's kind of a shame. I guess you get what you pay for. It was perfect while it lasted though.
customer_reviews.author: timothy stucki

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new tri-fold wallet. I was looking for one with slots for credit cards and at least two I.D. windows for a medical card and my driver's license. This Perry Ellis Park Avenue really fits the bill. It has four slots for credit cards and three I.D. windows. It looks and feels great and seems to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: steve d

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice and my husband was so happy to get it
customer_reviews.text: When we received your package, I could not wait to open it. It is very nice and my husband was so happy to get it. He loved it and the quality is impressive. There are no complaints here for your products. We appreciate being able to get quality products and do not need to empty your wallet. You packaging is always there to protect whatever product you purchase. Thank you for excellent work.
customer_reviews.author: Trailer 116

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet, still smells like leather.
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction and materials. Looks like a wallet you would get for a lot more money. Lots of room for all the stuff I like to put in my wallet. Only thing I dont like is that it is open on the bottom in the bill area, just two little holes in the corners where it folds. Also my old wallet had a zipper to close the back part of the bill area, I wish this one had one of those too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Linhart

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet, not expensive
customer_reviews.text: I only write reviews for products I like or totally do not like if i think you would get ripped off buy wasting your time. I like this wallet and prefer trifold style. The one feature I could give or take is the flip out middle section just make the wallet thicker. I want more room to place business cards, or something with the like credit card, small photograph on the inside like my well worn Jones NY trifold.
customer_reviews.author: No Money Today

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft leather. Great price and quality. Lots of places to tuck cards but not bulky
customer_reviews.author: C. Connell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is solidly built, no loose threads or fraying fabrics. It squares up nicely and has plenty of room. The ID window could stand to be just a wee bit bigger though; I have to keep tucking my driver's license back into it because it doesn't quite fit all the way in. The edge of the ID is flush with the leather trim around the window, instead of inside it where the trim could help hold the ID in place when it catches on the trim. Not a deal breaker at all, but it keeps that fifth star off of my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet to carry your hard earned cash 😄
customer_reviews.text: Thus wallet was just perfect, liked the material it was made out of
customer_reviews.author: Connie Young

customer_reviews.title: Convenient tri-fold for lightweight loading
customer_reviews.text: If this wallet was about a 1/4" taller and wider it would be perfect. Slightly larger size would make it easier to get credit cards in and out of pocket slots and the flip up center section. Drivers license and other ID cards are a very tight fit. If you carry lots of pictures, credit cards, business cares, etc., this may not be the wallet for you. Good quality and I am still breaking it in.
customer_reviews.author: MCO

customer_reviews.title: Cost Benefit Ratio Wins! Style At A Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new wallet and this is both functional and non-ostentatious. Room for cards is ok though I could use more (keeps it slim though). Two billfold sections lets me separate currency.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stein

customer_reviews.title: Gift for hubby....he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: He was very particular about his wallet....needed many slots and dividers....which this has! It's durable and the leather is nice and smooth. It's not a cheap looking or feeling wallet, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: L. Pallenik

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift but the leather is so soft and nice I'm pretty sure the intended will love
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift but the leather is so soft and nice I'm pretty sure the intended will love it
customer_reviews.author: RGarcia.

customer_reviews.title: Great basic wallet
customer_reviews.text: Husband says he loves it. He likes a basic tri-fold wallet and this fits his tastes well. He likes that it has a flap to hold the ID that you can flip out when carded. He also likes the separator inside the billfold.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: I expected better
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't shed that leathery smell, which in this case is not attractive.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bickram

customer_reviews.title: Sad puppy owner
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful wallet with a lot of slots for credit cards! Very soft! It was so nice our dog chewed it up Lol Having to order another!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Leblanc

customer_reviews.title: But he says that this wallet is a higher quality with better stitching.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my fiance and he likes it. His last wallet was a Swiss Gear one that started falling apart almost immediately. But he says that this wallet is a higher quality with better stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Soft yet strong supple leather. Dual window flap plus another clear window can see three cards. Four pockets plus three inserts for additional cards, dual bill fold section. I'm actually planning on buying another just to have for future. Excellent product worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dallasj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful wallet. My husband is going to love it. It’s exactly the style he likes
customer_reviews.author: Loretta C

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but needs to be tested
customer_reviews.text: Good wallet. Most likely to hold larger capacity of items than other ones out there. Will need to be tested to see if it can hold large capacity and stand the test of time. So buy with caution.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: My fiancé loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé is SO picky and he loves this wallet! Especially the feature that separates the money compartment into two!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Tight, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: I had a trifold with pocket on all three sides. This one has pockets on two sides. Couldn't find one like my old wallet. The compartments are very tight for credit cards. The material is stiff, so it will take a while to conform to back pocket. Not very pliable at this point. It should loosen up with age.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Funk

customer_reviews.title: and my dad seems to love it! Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an XMAS present, and my dad seems to love it! Great Product
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. I purchased as a Father's day gift. The leather feels soft. Tried the slots and had no problems fitting cards and didn't fall out either. Will consider adding more to review after recipient has had more time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I went through a wallet every couple of years until ...
customer_reviews.text: I went through a wallet every couple of years until I got this one. I've had it for a while now and it shows no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Morris

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband - he loves it. Flip out for his driver's license and 2 pockets for dollar bills to seperate larger and smaller bills for safety are his favorite features
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product except for center section which folds out separately. Once you put a card in sleeve, it falls out because there is no secure closure mechanism. Not good !! Otherwise the tri fold wallet is great.
customer_reviews.author: mgreen

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet, not bulky like others said
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews saying the wallet was too bulky. I was nervous to purchase since it was a gift. My husband loves it and it's not bulkier than a typical trifold. So far good quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes Amazon
customer_reviews.text: asks for a product review way too soon. I received this wallet just a couple of days ago, transferred into it yesterday; and so far, I think it's a great high quality product... but ask me again in three months.
customer_reviews.author: JJK

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. It honestly should have more and bigger card pockets but has 2 cash slots and is perfect for the design except for one thing, not being able to lock it closed in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: my money has never been more comfortable. the leather and lining snuggle it perfectly when ...
customer_reviews.text: my money has never been more comfortable. the leather and lining snuggle it perfectly when there is any left in there.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate!!!
customer_reviews.text: My adult son loved this wallet!! It looks and feels like a much more expensive wallet. I feel very happy with this purchase and have no hesitation in recommending it to you!!!
customer_reviews.author: WannaTellU

customer_reviews.title: Perry Ellis
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet that doesn't use much space in your pocket. I really like the 3 clear identification Windows and the bill divider for receipts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Michael Huerta

customer_reviews.title: 1yr of use and still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: It is now almost going to be a year since I bought this wallet and it is still in one piece. No signs of deterioration, Still looks as good as the day I first got it. Would highly recommend this wallet to anybody as a gift for yourself or someone else as equally deserving. This is very well made and the leather is Great.
customer_reviews.author: VN-One

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality the leather doesnt conserve the form of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality the leather doesnt conserve the form of the wallet if you put inside some cards the wallet lose the form

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good
customer_reviews.text: The wallet was great. My boyfriend liked the quality and that there was a place for everything. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: It was a great
customer_reviews.text: I have no regrets in buying this wallet . It was a great buy

customer_reviews.title: Good Leather. I pack a wallet
customer_reviews.text: Good Leather. I pack a wallet, and it takes a while for it to form into the shape I need. This one will, and I look forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: ... to break in but man does this wallet feel great..
customer_reviews.text: It's taken a little while to break in but man does this wallet feel great... I love it.. I do kind of wish it had more credit card slots but hey I can live with the 4..
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Xmas present for Hubby. It is very soft, high quality, looks very sturdy and handles all the various items he needs to carry. He was very pleased with it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet. Top grade leather. I would recommend this item.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best wallet I have owned so far.. i think it will loosen over time to allow more cards..

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet, solid...I'm pretty sure it will last for years to come.

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a new wallet for vacation, this one hit the spot, like all the features, now just gotta break it in!!

customer_reviews.title: Trifold Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it. It is made well, leather is soft. Compartments are just what he was looking for. He especially likes the Middle compartment to hold pics.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas last year and he loves it. Says its the nicest wallet he's ever had. Wanted to know where I got it.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Not too big to fit comfortably in my back pocket but large enough to hold what I need (cash, identification, and several credit cards).
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It is a good looking men's wallet made of what appears durable material. But, more importantly, the person I gave it to as a gift said it was perfect for his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: the perfect wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who had inadvertently washed his tried-and-true 8-year-old trifold wallet. This one has all the features of his old one plus a compartment or two but maintains the same small profile. It is very good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Classy wallet...a bit thicker than others.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality but a little thicker with the flip out....so if you want a flat wallet this one is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Consigny

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is perfect for me. I love it. It is soft, too and has a place for everything. I will use this till it falls apart.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Very soft leather, and made very well. I searched several other wallets, and deceided on this one because of price and quality, Very pleased with the quality and workmanship.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very nice wallet. I like it but I bought 3 of these as Christmas gifts. So the real test is yet to come!

customer_reviews.text: great wallet, waited a few weeks to review to see how it would hold up and so far so good. hope fully this will last me a long time, i am def happy with my purchase so far. love the look, and feel of the leather. good size

customer_reviews.title: and thicker than i would like. I even removed the flip out licensce holder
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is much bigger, heavier, and thicker than i would like. I even removed the flip out licensce holder. If you want a large thick wallet, even with nothing in it, this is. For you.

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet. First I brought because of the nostalgic of my father's wallet tri-fold, and only used a leather tri-fold wallet; now I know why he used it only. Holds everything and keeps everything in with secret compartments.

customer_reviews.title: Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband and he likes it. It has plenty of room for his credit cards and ID's which is a plus.

customer_reviews.title: Perry Ellis Trifold Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas and he really likes it. He's carrying around too much stuff but he's satisfied even though it doesn't all fit :-)

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Got for dad for birthday and he was extremely happy with it and he would def tell me the truth!

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made
customer_reviews.text: I like it. The product is of high quality even the box that it came with looked impressive. Definitely recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Just as Described
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet - came in a lovely box too. The leather feels great and it looks slick. I know my husband will have this thing for awhile - and when this one goes I may look to another one just like it!
customer_reviews.author: Mikinzi Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet to replace my aging Fossil brand wallet I received a number of years ago and I can already tell that this new wallet will last me even longer. High quality leather and stitching as well as a well thought out layout make it easy to carry all I need without having the hassle of trying to get cards out of obscure locations. All in all an excellent buy.

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is very good quality. My husband has had the same wallet for the last 15 years, and I finally convinced him to get a new one. I ordered a leather wallet from another website before purchasing this, and the quality difference is immense. The other wallet felt cheap, and the leather seemed almost fake. This wallet is genuine, and very sturdy. My husband is very happy with his new wallet!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good buy.

Everything fits perfectly and he's happy enough to carry it into another decade. Seller packaged the product well, arrived when promised and I would use this seller again. No problems...

product_meta.title: Perry Ellis Men's Park Avenue Trifold Wallet
feature_bullets: Leather trifold wallet with three ID windows featuring two currency compartments
